issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Update README for 2.6.0 support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12019](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12019). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Parquet README still talks about supporting 2.4.0, with a TODO for 2.5.0.
When the 2.6.0 support is completed, we can update the README.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12019?focusedCommentId=17308972) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9770
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9770>
